patterns: Can I download the class notes?

responses: No. All class notes are designed for use on the website, and as such, they cannot be downloaded, printed, or copied.

patterns: What is the next thing to do after making payment for a subscription plan?
What next thing will I do after I have made payment for a subscription plan?
What next for me to do after making payment for a subscription plan
What is the next thing after making payment for a subscription plan?
responses: Go on to correctly fill out the payment confirmation form on the link provided to you, after which your subscription would be processed.
Go and correctly fill out the payment confirmation form on the link provided to you, after which your subscription would be processed.

patterns: Why am I requested to 'click to enroll' after paying for a subscription plan?
Why did I need to 'click to enroll' after paying for a subscription plan?
responses: The 'click to enroll' action is a one-time action that would be carried out by users who are making use of any set of class notes for the first time. Hence, if you are returning to use a class note that you have accessed before, then you would not be asked to 'click to enroll'.

The 'click to enroll' action is a one-time action that would be carried out by users who are making use of any set of class notes for the first time. Hence, if you are returning to use a class note that you have accessed before, then you would not be asked to 'click to enroll' again.

patterns: Can I get access to current secondary school examination questions and answers?
Can I get access to the current secondary school examination questions and answers?
Did you provide access to current examination questions and answers?
responses: No please, Passnownow.com is a site that upholds integrity and firmly stands against all forms of examination malpractice, we do not provide answers to current examinations. Although, you can make use of our notes, practice exercises, and past questions to prepare for the examinations beforehand

Not at all! Passnownow.com is a platform that upholds integrity and firmly stands against all forms of examination malpractice, we do not provide answers to current examinations. Although, you can make use of our notes, practice exercises, and past questions to prepare for the examinations ahead of your examinations

patterns: Will my plan expire even if I don't log in for the complete duration of time I paid for?
Will my subscription plan expire even if I don't log in for the complete duration of time I paid for?
Will my subscription expire even if I don't log in for the complete duration of time I paid for?
responses: Yes please, as soon as your account is activated for your paid ssubscription, your plan becomes active and it would expire once the plan's timeline elapses.
Yes please, as soon as your account is activated for your plan, your subscription becomes active and it would expire once the plan's timeline elapses.

patterns: Do I have to log in every time I need to use swagric.com?
Is it a requirement that I must log in every time I need to use swagric.com?
Do I have to log in on every occassion I need to use swagric.com?
responses: You do not need to log in every time you need access if you are using the same device, however you will be required to log in again into your account if you happen to be using a different device. You can only access swagric.com from your account with only one device at once.

You do not need to log in every time you need access if you are using the same device, however you will be required to log in again into your account if you happen to be using a different device. You will only have access to swagric.com from your account with only one device at a time.

patterns: Can my friends and I log in with my login details at the same time on different devices?
Can I log in with my login details at the same time together with others on different devices?
Can my siblingss and I log in using my login details at the same time on different devices?
responses: No please, you and your friends/siblings can not be logged in at the same time with the same log-in details on different devices. You and your friends/siblings can however schedule the access and log in after each other or buy separate plans for easy access.

No please, you and your others can not be logged in at the same time with the same log-in details on different devices. You and your friends/siblings can however schedule the access and log in after each other or buy separate plans for easy access.

patterns: Can I copy, save or download the class notes or other content on Passnownow.com?
Can I copy, save or download the class notes or other content on the passnownow website?
Will I be able to copy, save or download the class notes or other content on Passnownow.com?
responses: Please, you can't. This is strictly an ONLINE learning and content development platform. Like other progressive countries. Nigeria's Education must go beyond classrooms, chalk, and blackboard. We must grow along with the rest of the world. Our lifelong dream is to use disruptive innovation to lead a movement of personalized learning and distribute quality educational content for students and teachers across Nigeria. By this, we hope to be able to raise enrollment numbers and increase the pass rates in exams for underserved students while also working to improve instructional practice by training and empowering teachers.

Please, you can't. Passnownow is strictly an ONLINE learning and content development platform. Like other progressive countries. Nigeria's Education must go beyond classrooms, chalk, and blackboard. We must grow along with the rest of the world. Our lifelong dream is to use disruptive innovation to lead a movement of personalized learning and distribute quality educational content for students and teachers across Nigeria. By this, we hope to be able to raise enrollment numbers and increase the pass rates in exams for underserved students while also working to improve instructional practice by training and empowering teachers.

patterns: Are there any changes and reviews to the content on Passnownow?
Are there any changes and reviews to the content on Passnownow over time?
Are there any changes and reviews to the contents on Passnownow on regular basis?
responses: Yes, all educational contents on Passnownow are reviewed and revised from time to time, so that they correspond with the curriculum requirements for secondary schools, as stipulated by the Nigerian Ministry of Education.

Yes, all educational contents are reviewed and revised from time to time, so that they correspond with the curriculum requirements for secondary schools, as stipulated by the Nigerian Ministry of Education.

patterns: How do I know if my subscription has been activated?

responses: All subscriptions are activated as soon as relevant payment and user information has been received by our system. Once a user's subscription is activated, such users would also get an email confirmation for the same.

Your subscriptions are activated as soon as relevant payment and user information has been received by our system. Once a user's subscription is activated, such users would also get an email confirmation for the same.

patterns: How long will it take before my account is activated after I have paid?
How long will it take you before you activated my account after I have made payment?
How long will it take before my account to be activated after I have made payment?
responses: If you pay using Paystack with your ATM card, you'll be able to start using the website immediately as your account will be activated at once but if you pay using the Paystack Bank Transfer or Bank Deposit/Transfer. It may take about 4hrs before you can access your notes because we have to first receive the payment alert from the bank and consider the network issues with the different banks before our technical staff activates your account from our back office for you. Please also note that you have to be fully registered on swagric.com for you to be able to use it at all. Even if you have paid via bank transfer and you are not registered, you will not be able to access the contents/lessons on the site.

If you pay via Paystack with your ATM card, you'll be able to start using the website immediately as your account will be activated at once. But if you pay using the Paystack Bank Transfer or Bank Deposit/Transfer. It may take about 4hrs before you can access your notes because we have to first receive the payment alert from the bank and consider the network issues with the different banks before our technical staff activates your account from our back office for you. Please also note that you have to be fully registered on swagric.com for you to be able to use it at all. Even if you have paid via bank transfer and you are not registered, you will not be able to access the contents/lessons on the platform.

responses: Once you make payment for a plan on swagric.com, you will have full access to all the contents and notes available on swagric.com, till your plan elapses.
Once you make payment for a plan on swagric.com, you will be given full access to all the contents and notes available on swagric.com, till your plan elapses.

responses: For now, your child/ward's examination results cannot be sent to you. Although we are working on this, at the moment, you can log into your child/ward's account using their login details to see their activities on the website and monitor their progress.

Currently, your child/ward's examination results taken on passnownow cannot be sent to you. Although we are working on this, at the moment, you can log into your child's or ward's account using their login details to see their activities on the platform and monitor their progress.
